The Route

The Journey

From ancient Egypt through the Silk Road, across the Mediterranean, over the Great Wall, to the New World. A culinary expedition spanning millennia.

01

مصر

Egypt

"Where It Began"

From the banks of the Nile, where pharaohs once commanded empires, comes a tradition of sweetness that has endured millennia. Egyptian desserts carry the warmth of the sun and the wisdom of ancient craft.

Rose waterOrange blossomPistachioHoney

Signature Desserts

Kunafa
Basbousa
Om Ali
02

Türkiye

Turkey

"The Crossroads"

At the crossroads of continents, Ottoman artisans perfected the art of layered pastry. Turkish sweets carry the weight of empire and the delicacy of centuries-old craft.

PistachioRoseSaffronHoney

Signature Desserts

Baklava
Lokum
Kunefe
03

Ελλάδα

Greece

"Mediterranean Sun"

From the land of gods and philosophers comes a tradition of sweetness as old as democracy itself. Greek desserts honor the bounty of the Mediterranean.

HoneyCinnamonWalnutOrange

Signature Desserts

Galaktoboureko
Loukoumades
Kataifi
04

Italia

Italy

"La Dolce Vita"

From the cafes of Rome to the patisseries of Milan, Italian desserts embody la dolce vita. Simple ingredients, masterful technique, and a passion for pleasure.

CoffeeMascarponeRicottaCitrus

Signature Desserts

Tiramisu
Cannoli
Panna Cotta
05

France

France

"Haute Patisserie"

In the ateliers of Paris, dessert is elevated to high art. French patisserie demands precision, respects tradition, and pursues perfection in every layer.

ButterVanillaChocolateCaramel

Signature Desserts

Mille-feuille
Macarons
Éclairs
06

السعودية

Saudi Arabia

"Desert Hospitality"

In the heart of the Arabian Peninsula, hospitality is sacred. Saudi desserts honor this tradition with ingredients from the land: dates, cardamom, and the warmth of shared moments.

DatesCardamomSaffronRose

Signature Desserts

Maamoul
Luqaimat
Dates & Tahini
07

中国

China

"Ancient Craft"

In the misty mountains of the East, dessert is an art form perfected over millennia. Every bite carries the weight of dynastic tradition and the precision of master craftsmen.

Red beanLotus seedOsmanthusGinger

Signature Desserts

Mooncakes
Tangyuan
Egg Tarts
08

USA

America

"Modern Fusion"

Where tradition meets innovation, American desserts embrace global influences and transform them into something entirely new. Bold, confident, and unapologetically delicious.

ChocolateVanillaPeanut butterCaramel

Signature Desserts

NYC Cookies
Fudge Brownies
Banana Pudding
